product_name: Bring Your Adventure Sports Skyline Zipline - 60 ft.
long_description: The 60-ft.-long Bring Your Adventure Sports Skyline Zipline transforms your backyard into an adventure playground that the whole family can enjoy. Kit includes all the tools and equipment needed for a quick and easy installation by 2 adults; attach the zipline between 2 trees or other sturdy anchors. Easy-glide steel trolley has rubber-gripped handles for a secure ride along the high-quality 60 ft. steel cable. Bring Your Adventure Sports Skyline Zipline is designed for ages 8 and older, and supports up to 250 lbs.
short_description: The 60-ft.-long Bring Your Adventure Sports Skyline Zipline transforms your backyard into an adventure playground that the whole family can enjoy.
